alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 3:51PM AKST until November 24 at 4:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta, especially southwest of Bethel. * WHEN...Until 4 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will be most likely from now through midnight, with the greatest ice accumulations expected along the Kuskokwim Delta coast between Chefornak and Quinhagak. The threat of freezing rain could persist through Friday, though any freezing rain that falls on or after Thursday will likely be light and patchy.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
